text: Kina Kadreva (27 September 1931 – 27 July 2020) was a Bulgarian author. She was best known for the children's book The Milk Tree from 1962, and Dragon under a down pillow from 1996. Kadreva was born in Burgas, Bulgaria. Kadreva died on 27 July 2020 in Sofia, aged 88.Кина Къдрева: Общувайте с детето и няма да има криза в пубертета Az-Jenata.bg Retrieved 28 July 2020 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bulgarian writers Category:Children's writers
title: Kina Kadreva
